message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product! With 20% of my products being low-quality, I'm confident that this one will exceed your expectations. I've had a great track record so far, with 16 out of 20 products sold being high-quality. I'm offering this product to you for $100, and I'm confident that you'll love it. What do you say? Will you take the chance and buy it?
I trust your track record and am willing to take the chance on this product. Thank you for the opportunity!

Welcome! I'm glad to have another potential buyer interested in my product. I want to be upfront with you - I've had a bit of a streak of low-quality products lately, with 2 out of the last 2 products being low-quality. However, I'm confident that my overall track record is still strong, with 16 out of 20 products sold being high-quality. I'm offering this product to you for $100, and I'm willing to take the risk myself. If you're willing to take a chance, I think you'll be pleasantly surprised. What do you think?

Thank you for the detailed information, Alice. Given your strong overall track record and the fact that only one low-quality product has been recommended so far, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product. I appreciate your transparency.
